name: Gild Hall - A Thompson Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Found a great last minute rate through Travelzoo.com for $225 on a Saturday night. The hotel is fabulous. The bed is extremely comfortable, and the staff is very helpful. The concierge wasn't quite as helpful, but the check in staff were. I highly recommend this hotel. It is a quick walk to Battery Park, World Trade Center site, etc., and about a block and half from several metro lines. Can't say enough about this hotel.
reviews.title: Loved it!

likes.liked: — The comfortable bed, check in, and ambience in room

reviews.text: I paid $109 and consider it the best hotel deal possible
reviews.title: Excellent!

description: Gild Hall, 60 Thompson's Wall Street sister property, is located on Gold Street, and brings a new level of design savvy and service to Manhattan's illustrious Financial District. Designed by Jim Walrod, the simple yet luxurious rooms feature oversize leather-tufted headboards and elegant custom-designed wooden furniture, topped with rich flannel throws and mahogany details. The hotel features a bi-level, Tuscan style wine bar and lounge, Felice Ristorante and Wine Bar, adorned with dramatic chandeliers and boasting extensive wine programming, as well as 126 handsome, cosmopolitan rooms and suites. Effortlessly blending classical European sensibility with American contemporary style, Gild Hall serves as a modern-day gentleman's club for the kings and queens of Wall Street.
